location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire to Narrayen Wassadeojee

physicalDescription.extent: Watermark: The paper contains the watermark 'C Millington, London, 1867'.

mods.abstract: Letter asking for Narrayen's assistance in obtaining a cheap return ticket to England so that Pelly's uncovenanted assistant James Charles Edwards can return home during his six months leave.
